attributes.action: Government funding for mental health within education
attributes.additional_details: There should be enough support workers within the team so that no student is ever shut out or told that there is no time for them.Mental health is very important and a massive issue worldwide,people having the feeling of loneliness or helplessness may lead to drastic things like self harm or suicide. Something like this can save hundreds and thousands of lives.Students should never be rejected or feel as if they have no where to go.This will prevent that and give them support that they need.
attributes.background: Many schools do not have much put in place for students who suffer from bad mental health and are in need of support/help. Governments should fund the schools or supply schools with a team of councillors who’s full time job will be to care for, support students and actually speak to and help them.

rejection.details:
Require all schools to offer regular counselling to students:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328361

You may also be interested in signing some of these petitions:

Fund a national awareness campaign for mental health in schools:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553711

Fund free Mental Health First Aider training for 1 adult in every school:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548425

Make mental health and wellbeing checks compulsory in all levels of education:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331616

Make mental health awareness part of the national curriculum at all levels:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561016
